sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
'SELECT * FROM SalesLT.Customer WHERE ModifiedDate > ''',
string(activity('Lookup1').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue),
''' AND ModifiedDate <= ''',
formatDateTime(utcNow(),'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss'),
''''
)

value.name: customer
value.query: SELECT * FROM SalesLT.Customer WHERE CustomerID > 100 AND CustomerID < 1000

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT ct.FirstName, ct.MiddleName, ct.LastName, ca.AddressType
FROM SalesLT.Customer AS ct
INNER JOIN SalesLT.CustomerAddress AS ca
  ON ct.CustomerID = ca.CustomerID;
